name: mdtutor
description: Markdown-based learning platform for Makerspace tutorials

scripts.test: pnpm run test:sentinel && pnpm run lint && node --test
scripts.test:sentinel: RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/0-process/branch_health.rb && RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/0-process/workflow.rb && RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/0-process/docs_integrity.rb && RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/1-setup/environment.rb && RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/1-setup/port_integrity.rb
scripts.test:sentinel:agent: SENTINEL_FORMAT=agent RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/0-process/branch_health.rb && SENTINEL_FORMAT=agent RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/0-process/workflow.rb && SENTINEL_FORMAT=agent RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/0-process/docs_integrity.rb && SENTINEL_FORMAT=agent RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/1-setup/environment.rb && SENTINEL_FORMAT=agent RUBYLIB=~/.sentinel/lib ruby test/1-setup/port_integrity.rb
scripts.test:frontend: pnpm --filter @mdtutor/web run test:unit && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.dev: node tools/kill-ports.js && dotenv -- concurrently -k -n api,web,achiev,sso -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "pnpm run api" "pnpm run web" "pnpm run achievements" "pnpm run sso"
scripts.dev:test: node tools/kill-ports.js && RAILS_ENV=test dotenv -- concurrently -k -n api,web,achiev,sso -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "pnpm run api" "pnpm run web" "pnpm run achievements" "pnpm run sso"
scripts.dev:bg: dotenv -- concurrently -k -n api,web,achiev,sso -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "pnpm run api" "pnpm run web" "pnpm run achievements" "pnpm run sso"
